descriptionHtml:
An my dear friend loves so much Brynjolf but i can\\\'t have him such as follower. So i made for an friend this new follower, but i decide too to share with you. I changed his voice because the original don\\\'t work for follower scripts. You can find him in The Bee&Barb.
Sorry for my bad english, it isn\\\'t my native linguage.

*How to install with NMM: open program, go to add file, search NewBrynjolf rar and click to open.                      Then, go to activate and have fun ^^.

*How to install manual: open NewBrynjolf rar., put texture and meshes in texture and meshes data folder on main directory folder. Then put New Brynjolf esp in data folder ... have fun ^^.

If you don\\\'t like this mod and want to delete files, just to go in main directory folder, looking for texture and mesh \\\"NewBrynjolf\\\" and in data folder NewBrynjolf esp.

For any problem please let me a comment below the mod!
Thank you ;)
author: Nephae
